it, even in self-defense?
The first thing to be said about this is that it is something new. Opponents
of abortion have been so concerned to make out the independence of the fe-
tus, in order to establish that it has a right to life, just as the mother does,
that they have tended to overlook the possible support they might gain from
making out that the fetus is dependenton the mother, in order to establish
that she has a special kind of responsibility for it, a responsibility th
